OOC: I always mix the two of em! Sorry! and thanx about Tankor

As the new robots arrived, Daemos grinned, while Belthassan seemed to 
concentrate. The task would be hard, but he could do it.

Daemos:
Good! Now we can start! Who wishes to go first?

Tankor took a step forward:
I shall be the first. What do I have to do?

Belthassan:
Follow us. We will do this in the sanctuary.

The sanctuary was a large, round room, filled with techno-organic 
flowers and vines. At its center was a large circle.

Belthassan:
Please be seated at the center of the circle.

Tankor sat down, while Daemos and Belthassan sat at the edge of the 
circle, facing Tankor.

Daemos was unususlly calm. His sarcasm had evaporated and a more 
serious part of him was at work.

Daemos:
Now Tankor, you will become a true Tripredacus. You shall know every 
ounce of the Tripredacus Mysticism. You shall become...

Belthassan:
...one with the Matrix.

A strong beam fired from the sparks of the two commander and hit 
Tankor fully. He felt no pain though. A blinding light bathed the 
entire room. Tankor's mind opened and he saw the circle beneath him 
disrupt, the floor collapsing and him falling in the void and into a 
large roung gate, filled with the sparks of all those gone and all 
those yet to be. The oracle. The artefact that gave the Tripredacus 
their power. Then the Matrix, the flow of the sparks. And he saw his 
own spark, and he knew he somehow had linked its destiny to the 
Matrix. And then he saw the Tripredacus and their sacred duty: to 
bestow the power of the Matrix upon all Transformers, by any means 
possible. He felt pride, joy and he felt humble at serving the Matrix.

The light then faded away. He saw Belthassan slowly collapsing on his 
side.

Belthassan:
Tankor of the Tripredacus, welcome to the power of the Matrix!

Tankor then realized he was changed, both phisically and mentally. He 
was calmer now...

OOC:Thanx Lord! Now you decide whatever form you want him to be! Your 
other chars will feel something alike when they are reformatted.
